other_tests.findings: Distended gallbladder with stones and sludge, borderline gallbladder wall thickening, mild pericholecystic fluid, negative Sonographic findings.

New opacification of the right lung base suggesting moderate right pleural effusion, blunting of the left costophrenic angle compatible with a small left pleural effusion, streaky opacification of the left lung base likely reflecting atelectasis.
